message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_RECDATE_GREATER_THAN_TDATE
message.locale: Receipt date cannot be greater than today's date.

message.name: ERR_NO_PROD_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE
message.locale: The default delivery pattern for the product '%1s', has no value on '%2d'. This product must be re-configured by an administrator before a case can be created.

message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_CLIENT_CONCERN_ROLE_BLANK
message.locale: The client for whom the product delivery is being created must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_CLIENT_CONCERN_ROLE_NO_REG
message.locale: The client for whom the product delivery is being created must be registered.

message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_PRODUCTPROVIDER_CONCERN_ROLE_BLANK
message.locale: The product provider for the product delivery case must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_PRODUCTPROVIDER_CONCERN_ROLE_NO_REG
message.locale: The product provider must be registered.

message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_PRIMARY_ADDRESS_BLANK
message.locale: A primary address does not exist for the client.

message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_PROVIDER_BLANK
message.locale: A product provider must exist for this product in order for a case to be created.

message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_PROVISION_LOCATION_BLANK
message.locale: A provision location must be entered for the provision for which this case is to be created.

message.name: ERR_CASE_FV_DEFAULT_DELIVERY_PATTERN_BLANK
message.locale: A default delivery pattern must be selected.

message.name: ERR_CASEHEADER_FV_CASECLOSED
message.locale: A product delivery cannot be created for an Integrated Case that is closed or pending closure.
